alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:57PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy through early evening. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Jackson county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will occur through 9 pm. After that time the snow will mix with or change to rain for a time before more snow showers return late tonight or early Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
